alert.note: Alert for Moore; Sherman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 13 at 5:55PM CDT until June 13 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Moore County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 555 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Cactus, or 16 miles north of Dumas, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and baseball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Cactus and Sunray. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN
info.instruction: This storm has a history of producing tornadoes. TAKE COVER NOW! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
